sen.j: 北方貿易（ほっぽうぼうえき）とは、奥州藤原氏、あるいはそれ以前に奥羽を支配した安倍氏 (奥州)や出羽清原氏が中国（北宋）との間で行った貿易。
sen.e: Northern trade was the trade between China (Northern Song Dynasty) and the Oshu-Fujiwara clan or the Abe clan (Oshu) who dominated Ou and the Dewa Kiyohara clan before then.
Northern Trade was the trade between China (Northern Song Dynasty) and the Oshu-Fujiwara clan or the Abe clan (Oshu) and the Dewa Kiyohara clan who dominated Ou before then.
sen.cmt: Northern Tradeとし、the Dewa Kiyohara clanの位置を移動
sen.e: Northern Trade was the trade between China (Northern Song Dynasty) and the Oshu-Fujiwara clan or the Abe clan (Oshu) and the Dewa Kiyohara clan who dominated Ou before then.

sen.j: 主に十三湊を拠点として行われた。
sen.e: It was done mainly at Tosaminato as the base.
It was done mainly at Tosaminato as the base.
It was done mainly at Tosaminato as the base.

sen.j: のちに平清盛が南宋との間で行った日宋貿易と違い、北方のルートを通ったと思われる。
sen.e: It was different from the trade between Japan and the Sung Dynasty in China that was done by TAIRA no Kiyomori, and it seemed to go through a northern route.
Unlike the trade between Japan and the Sung Dynasty in China that was done by TAIRA no Kiyomori, it seems to have gone through a northern route.
sen.cmt: It was different from→Unlike、and it seemed to go→it seems to have goneとしました。
sen.e: Unlike the trade between Japan and the Sung Dynasty in China that was done by TAIRA no Kiyomori, it seems to have gone through a northern route.
